TextBlock.Text: BECK: Thank you for showing this to us, Fret. We would love to study this further. I doubt TONE has ever had a chance to study an artifact like this.
FRET: Hey, there is no one else I'd trust these relics than the two of you! The work you did on the <color=pink>Fire Focuser</color> was incredible.
BECK: All in a day's work. While I'm thinking about it, FRET, I meant to ask you something. Have you found any other instruments on this planet?
